ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Code Red
ComicInfo.Summary:
AGE OF DARKNESS
How can you protect yourself what you don't understand? As the curtains pull back to reveal the Dark Horde's latest weapon, an insane shape-shifter named Ivory, Britney is forced to face a terrible truth about herself. Can she stop the Cyclops' Eye from falling into the hands of those who would use it for evil, or will she succumb to the darkness that's been hiding in the recesses of her mind for years?
